msgImportConfig: This will overwrite the existing configuration file and this action is not undoable, sure about this?
msgNotFound: Please add a new rule, or import an existing configuration file (in JSON format), otherwise this extension will not do anything.
msgCssSelector: The <code/> field uses the <link/> syntax to specify the element to be tagged on the page.
msgDoNotModify: If you are not familiar with the CSS selector syntax, please do not modify this field, as this may invalidate the extension.
msgBodySelector: Most sites can specify this field as <code/>, which adds furigana to Japanese text on most pages.
msgSelectorMerge: The <codeSelector/> fields are separated by comma, and selectors corresponding to the same <codeDomain/> will be merged directly.
msgDeleteRule: The deletion rule is not undoable, sure about this?
errorPageGoBack: Go back to the Home Page
errorPageTip: Sorry, an unexpected error has occurred.
